explanation: [0-0] On a sunny day, Tom, a mime dressed in traditional black and white attire with white gloves, is performing in front of a large aquarium. He is standing at the edge of a pool filled with azure water, with a crowd eagerly watching him.

[0-8] Then, a tall man dressed in black walks out from the crowd, stands beside Tom, and prepares to take a selfie with him. Tom enthusiastically puts his arm around the man, posing for the selfie. A female spectator is also taking photos of them.
